name: repo-genesis
description: Allow everyone in your GitHub organisation to create public repos, not just owners

REPO_GENESIS_GITHUB_ORG.description: The Org the repos will be created in

REPO_GENESIS_GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: A GitHub access token - the bot will run with this account. Required scopes: read:org, repo

REPO_GENESIS_TEAMS_FOR_PRIVATE_REPOS.description: The comma-separated *numeric ids* of the GitHub teams which are permitted to create private repos. See https://developer.github.com/v3/orgs/teams/#list-teams

APPLICATION_SECRET.description: Random text to use as a crypto seed for signing session cookies. See https://www.playframework.com/documentation/2.4.x/ApplicationSecret

REPO_GENESIS_SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Slack incoming webhook to message when repo creation occurs. See https://api.slack.com/incoming-webhooks
